465320.name: Aselia the Eternal Soundtrack
465320.description:
The official soundtrack to Aselia the Eternal.

Soundtrack files will be downloaded inside your Aselia game folder.

Tracks:
01 The Spirit
02 Power Politics
03 Harrowring Battle
04 Great Fear
05 Brave Movement
06 Broken the Ethercore
07 Cursed Crisis
08 Dark of Dialogue
09 A Victor
10 Hi! High! Hi!
11 For Your Heart
12 A Gleam of Hope
13 Natural Garden
14 One Love
15 The End of Our Time
16 Lost Days
17 For Your Heart (sedbess ver)
18 The Aselia
19 Eternal Sky
20 Fairy's Act
21 Limit of Heaven -Opening Theme-
22 この大地の果てで (Beyond the Horizon) -Ending Theme-
23 Hallelujah
24 永遠のアセリア (Aselia the Eternal)
465320.supported_languages:
英语*, 日语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
